p.s: The purpose of the scene is to show the family's love for each other and how they care about each other.
Another purpose of the scene is to show how the Carter family is in contrast fear from getting harmed them both the gang violence and police violence.
To show the family's love for each other the director decided to use an orange color scheme which in combination with the calm music in the background gives off a positive/calming atmosphere.
Even after Maverick Carter is tucked to the ground his wife doesn't let him go and stays with him.
The close relationship is also lifted up by the changing close up shots of each family membersmember's face and smile while talking to each other.
Another cinematic device that is used to illustrate their chemistry is the calm music playing before and after the confrontation with the police.
Another distinct function of this scene is to display Starr's character growth.

In this scene she doesn't stop filming the events that are happninghappening which is a contrast to her previous encounter with the police where she dropped her phone because an officer ordered her to do so.
To display the constant violence Starr's family has to face from both gangs and the police the director decided to use several cinematic devices.
The warm atmosphere that was established at the beginning of the scene through an orange color scheme instantly vanishes as soon as the family looks outside.
The chilling and calming music stops and switches to a darker themed music.

The gang gets introduced with a really dark color scheme which is in direct contrast to the inside of the restaurant which in combination with the music demonstrates the audience the danger of the gang.
The music getgets louder as Maverick is heading towards them which focuses the viewersviewer's attention on what is about to happen.
The dark themed outside of the restaurant gets interrupted by a shining yellow gas station as the gang leaves the place which makes the viewer more concentrated on what is about to happen.
After the police arrives and starts heading towards Maverick a handhold camera is used and starts getting closer to Maverick as the police starststarts hedingheading to him.
The handheld camera causes the scene shadue and gets closer to Maverick which illustrates him feeling smaller and smaller.
This effect is also supported by the suspensive music in the background.
The violence and the conflict in this scene is illustrated through several cinematic devices such as color usage and change and the changing music throughout the scene.
Summing up one can say that this scene manages to implement the violence and conflict going on in this scene through perfect combination of camera movement, color usage and music.
